meanings.definition: Set up on a firm or permanent basis.
meanings.sent1: The family establishes a new tradition every year.
meanings.sent2: The company establishes its headquarters in the city.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel establishes its nest in the tall tree.
meanings.sent4: The artist establishes a strong foundation for the painting.
meanings.sent5: The gardener establishes a beautiful garden in the backyard.

meanings.definition: Show to be valid or true.
meanings.sent1: The evidence establishes his innocence beyond doubt.
meanings.sent2: The research study establishes a clear link between the two factors.
meanings.sent3: The magic trick establishes the rabbit as the star of the show.
meanings.sent4: The map establishes the correct route to the destination.
meanings.sent5: The certificate establishes her qualifications for the job.

meanings.sent1: The new policy establishes a positive change in the community.
meanings.sent2: The meeting establishes a platform for open communication.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain establishes a refreshing atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The handshake establishes a friendly connection between them.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock establishes a wake-up call for the day.
